item.title: Bootcamp Learning Objectives
item.description: Day 1 On day 1, students will: Receive a computer Create a GitHub account Learn about file folders and structure Understand the basics of HTML Document structure Tags Indentation Log in to freeCodeCamp and complete steps 1-10 of the (New) Responsive Web Design’s first project, Learn HTML by Building a Cat Photo App Day 2 Day 3 Day 4 Day 5
